Heading: Water pond in the hallway
Observation: There was a small puddle of water on the floor of the packaging department, which posed a risk of slipping.

Heading: Swinging railing on the stairs
Observation: On the metal stairs between the production facilities, the railing swayed dangerously. The fastening failed.

Heading: Inadequate protective clothing
Observation: The employee handled the powdered substance without a respirator in a clean room.

Heading: Stuff left on the stairs
Observation: Empty boxes had been left on the upper level of the stairs leading to the warehouse, there was a risk of tripping.

Heading: Chemical splash on the floor
Observation: In the laboratory, there was a small amount of unknown chemicals on the floor without a warning label.

Heading: Emergency stop button covered
Observation: In front of the emergency stop button on the mixer unit, there was a movable trolley that prevented quick operation.

Heading: Slippery step
Observation: One of the steps leading to the service platform was dangerously slippery.

Heading: Heavy lifting without aids
Observation: The warehouse worker lifted the heavy bag of raw materials alone without a lifting aid.

Heading: Fire corridor blocked
Observation: In front of the emergency exit, there was a pallet full of cardboard waste, which narrowed the passageway.

Heading: Broken socket
Observation: The casing of the socket in the dressing room was cracked, risk of electric shock.

Heading: Inadequate lighting on the stairs
Observation: The lighting in the stairwell leading to the basement was inadequate, one lamp was burnt out.

Heading: Sharp edge at the workstation
Observation: The metal worktop of the packaging line had a sharp edge that you could hurt yourself on.

Heading: Tools on the floor
Observation: After the maintenance work, a wrench and screwdrivers had been left on the floor.

Heading: Liquid splash on the stairs
Observation: Coffee had spilled on the stairs leading to the break room, causing a slipping hazard.

Heading: Dust accumulated in the electrical cabinet
Observation: A lot of dust had accumulated inside the old electrical cabinet of the production facility, a risk of fire.

Heading: Incorrect waste sorting
Observation: Reactive chemical waste had been placed in a normal laboratory waste container.

Heading: An employee ran up the stairs
Observation: The employee was observed running down the stairs on the office floor.

Heading: Gas cylinders without support
Observation: The gas cylinders in the laboratory stood freely against the wall without a chain or rack.

Heading: Shelf overloaded
Observation: The storage shelf had more stuff stacked than its weight limit allowed.

Heading: Worn floor covering
Observation: The floor covering in the cleanroom was worn out, making cleaning difficult and causing a tripping hazard.

Heading: The anti-slip stair has come loose
Observation: The anti-slip tape had come off the edge of the staircase leading to the front door and was torn.

Heading: Damaged extension cord
Observation: The insulation of the office extension cord had cracked, exposing internal wires.

Heading: The liquid in the eyewash bottle has expired
Observation: The eyewash bottle at the emergency shower station had expired.

Heading: A forklift was speeding
Observation: In the warehouse area, the forklift driver drove clearly over the permitted speed limit.

Heading: Carrying a big box up the stairs
Observation: The employee was carrying a large box that completely blocked the view when going up the stairs.

Heading: Incomplete safety data sheets
Observation: The safety data sheet for the new chemical could not be found at the workstation.

Heading: Air conditioning duct leaks condensate
Observation: An air conditioning duct in the ceiling of the corridor dripped condensate onto the floor.

Heading: Muffler disconnected from the machine
Observation: The muffler had come loose from the compressed air device, causing a lot of noise.

Heading: Pharmaceutical dust on surfaces
Observation: Pharmaceutical dust had remained on the surfaces of the weighing room after cleaning.

Heading: Dim lighting in the warehouse
Observation: At the back of the warehouse, the lighting was so dim that it was difficult to read the labels of the products.

Heading: Garbage left on the stairs
Observation: There was rubbish and empty coffee cups on the stairs of the break room.

Heading: A heavy object on the edge of the shelf
Observation: On a high storage shelf, there was a heavy box dangerously close to the edge.

Heading: The door slams shut
Observation: The door of the production facility slammed slammed shut, risk of crushing.

Heading: Floor hatch poorly marked
Observation: The floor hatch was open due to maintenance work, but there were no proper warning markings around it.

Heading: Cable in the walkway
Observation: A charging cable had been pulled across the office corridor, a tripping hazard.

Heading: Protective gloves broken
Observation: The employee wore broken protective gloves when handling the corrosive substance.

Heading: Swinging stair railing
Observation: The railing of the stairs at the main entrance swayed and gave way when leaning.

Heading: The crane safety limit does not work
Observation: The upper limit sensor of the production overhead crane did not work, causing a collision hazard.

Heading: Broken glass on the floor
Observation: In the laboratory, a beaker glass had fallen and shards had spread over a wide area.

Heading: Hand washing station soap out of stock
Observation: When entering the cleanroom, the soap dispenser at the hand washing station was empty.

Heading: Slippery outdoor staircase in the rain
Observation: The factory's exterior stairs were very slippery in the rain, no roughening.

Heading: Emergency exit locked
Observation: One of the emergency exits was locked with a key from the inside.

Heading: Falling objects from the shelf
Observation: The vibration caused small items to fall off the shelf near the production line.

Heading: Wet rag on the stairs
Observation: The cleaner had left a wet rag to dry on top of the stair railing, from where it had fallen onto the step.

Heading: Inadequate ergonomics in the packing room
Observation: The work surface on the packaging line was too low, causing the workers to stooped over their working position.

Heading: Missing warning sign
Observation: There was no sign warning about the wet floor after cleaning.

Heading: Staircase step broken
Observation: One of the steps on the concrete stairs was chipped, with a sharp edge and a pit.

Heading: Noisy device
Observation: One of the machines on the production line made an exceptionally loud, hissing noise.

Heading: Icicles on the edge of the roof
Observation: Large icicles hung above the main entrance, danger of falling.

Heading: An employee was talking on a mobile phone on the stairs
Observation: The employee walked down the stairs while looking at the phone screen, distracted.
